name: A massive halberd called 'the solesearcher' (2h)
data: It has nice weapon class for its type (good in general).
It increases the users strength a bit.
It increases the users constitution pitifully.
This item loses its magical powers very fast.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'blood harvest'.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'edged polearms'.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'balanced form'.
It does asphyxiation damage a good amount.
An imprint on the underside of the haft reads 'Gekko Ind.'
